title: International Field Learning Design Utilizing Transformative Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Providing learning experiences in simulation/VR environments for solving global scientific problems. Applying transformative pedagogies that promote collaborative and reflective thinking among learners

learning_goals: Learners must analyze complex international scientific field problems and propose solutions through VR simulations.

Learners write reflective journals twice a week for two weeks, identify three or more specific reflection points during the learning process, and develop one or more actionable plans for transformative growth based on them.

In small teams of 3â€“4 members, learners complete an interdisciplinary collaboration project (e.g., engineering-life sciences integrated solutions for environmental issues) over four weeks and demonstrate problem-solving capabilities through project deliverables (report and presentation) and peer evaluations (over 4 points on a 5-point scale).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
